casebody.data:
Margaret Brophy vs. Matthew McLaughlin et ux. Third Judicial District. decided July 18th, 1902. Opinion filed with the clerk of the City Court of Waterbury. Charles Gr. Root and William Kennedy, for the appellants (defendants). Luden F. Burpee and Terrence F. Carmody, for the appellee (plaintiff).

Submitted on briefs June 4th

Summary process brought before a justice of the peace and *727transferred to the City Court of Waterbury, where it was tried to the jury (Cowell, J".). Judgment for plaintiff, and appeal by defendants for alleged error in the charge of the court.

No error.
